welcomeMsg: Drop files here and/or enter URLs to fact-check
additionalContext: : Claims or additional information about the files and URLs you want to fact-check
claimExample: e.g., I came across this viral video claiming a new "turbo diet"
uploadFailed: Oops, upload failed. Please try again later.
topicCreationFailed: Oops, failed to create topic. Try again later.
fetchURLError: Oops, error fetching URL. Hint: submit screenshots and/or text content for context.
